profile.description: Single Input Contact (Window/Door), Supply voltage monitor

value.description: Supply voltage / super cap. (linear); 251 - 255 reserved for error code

profile.description: Window/Door-Sensor with States Open/Closed/Tilt, Supply voltage monitor and Vibration detection

value.description: Time in 1/10 seconds. 0 = no time specifed

enum.description: Lock for duration time if time >0, unlimited time of no time specified. Locking may be cleared with "unlock". During lock phase no other commands will be accepted or executed
Delay or duration (if Time > 0); 0 = Duration (Execute switching command immediately and switch back after duration) 1 = Delay (Execute switching command after delay)

value.description: Ramping time in seconds, 0 = no ramping, 1...255 = seconds to 100%
